Assessment.QuestionText: Which of the following statements about crystal reports are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The <font face="courier new">ReportSource</font> property helps in specifying which report the <font face="courier new">CrystalReportViewer</font> control should be bound to.
Crystal Reports allows reports to be generated only using ADO.NET datasets.
The Crystal Report Creation Wizard provides a step by step guide to generate reports.
The <font face="courier new">CrystalReportViewer</font> control binds the report to the application.
The report document allows you to choose the layout for reports.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(True), (B)-(False), (C)-(True), (D)-(True), and (E)-(False).
